common_error_messages.otp-invalid: Invalid OTP. Try again by clicking on resend.
common_error_messages.invalid-abha: Invalid ABHA number. Please try again.
common_error_messages.invalid-abha-length: ABHA number can only be of 14 digits
common_error_messages.already-exist-abha: An account with this ABHA number already exists.
common_error_messages.invalid-aadhar: Invalid Aadhaar number. Please try again.
common_error_messages.invalid-aadhar-length: Aadhaar number must be exactly 12 characters
common_error_messages.invalid-phone-number: Please enter a valid phone number.
common_error_messages.required-phone-number: Phone number must be exactly 12 characters
common_error_messages.wrong_password: Wrong Password. Try again or click Forgot Password to reset it.
common_error_messages.wrong_username: Account with this username doesn’t exist.

create_abha_page.title: Link or Create Ayushman Bharat Health Account - ABHA Number
create_abha_page.DESCRIPTION: ABHA number is a 14 digit number that will uniquely identify you as a participant in India’s digital healthcare ecosystem. ABHA number will establish a strong and trustable identity for you that will be accepted by healthcare providers and payers across the country.

form.title: Create your ABHA using Aadhaar number

create_abha_page.otp_description_aadhar: Enter the OTP sent to phone number linked with Aadhaar number
create_abha_page.otp_description_phone: Enter the OTP sent to XXXXXX{{number}}
create_abha_page.abha_create_link_success: ABHA number created and linked successfully.

link_abha_page.otp_description: Enter the OTP sent to mobile number linked with Aadhaar number
